abstract: Already, Bear Stearns has posted to its Web site all of the amended agreements in connection with its price renegotiation. (You can read the amended merger agreement here and the amended guarantee agreement here, both as PDFs.)
lead_paragraph: Already, Bear Stearns has posted to its Web site all of the amended agreements in connection with its price renegotiation. (You can read the amended merger agreement here and the amended guarantee agreement here, both as PDFs.)

headline.main: JPMorgan and Bear Test the Limits
